descriptions.overview: This homeowner grade hand auger is ideal for the homeowner. Designed with a vinyl sleeve to protect the toilet bowl from scratching. Made from 3/8 In. flexible wire, this auger is sure to release the most stubborn clog.
list: Vinyl sleeve protects bowl from scratching
Powerful enough to tackle the most stubborn clog

specs.title: For Use with Minimum Pipe Size (Inches)
For Use with Maximum Pipe Size (Inches)

reviews.title: "No thanks to my apartment maintenance"
reviews.text: Had stopped up my toilet good and getting no where with my plunger. I put in a work order for my apartment maintenance and went to work. Came home needing to use the bathroom, and to my aggravated disappointment, the toilet still cloged although the water had gone down. Tried plunging again and nothing. Now aggravated even more and still needing to use the bathroom i search toilet snake on lowes.com and saw this one was only 10$. Bingo. Went to lowes, used the bathroom, and got my snake. After some effort and some youtube vids because i didnt feel i was doing it right i got it going and fixed the toilet. No thanks to my apartment maintenance.
reviews.author: Heather

reviews.title: "Great product for a good price"
reviews.text: I was searching for a toilet snake to use for a tough clog in our toilet that nothing else would touch.  Many of the "professional" models were 3 or 4 times the price of this one, and since I really only needed it for one job, I went with this model.  It worked exceptionally well, removing the clog on the first try (a clog that I am pretty sure was a diaper that my daughter had flushed).  I cleaned the "business end" of the auger off and sprayed with a little WD-40 to prevent rust, and fully expect it to be perfectly functional on the next time I need to unclog a toilet.  Definitely a great buy.
reviews.author: stephenmsu

reviews.title: "For the price the best toilet auger on the planet."
reviews.text: Cant go wrong with this. I got three of them, one for each of my sons for Christmas who have small kids. Their toilets are going to get jammed and I know this does the trick to un-clog them. The curved end is the way to go, it wont scratch up the bowl - take it from experience. There are much heaver duty augers out there at three times the price, but unless you are trying to free solid concrete you don't need them. Be sure to spray some WD-40 on the auger after it dries off so it wont rust.
reviews.author: Hap

reviews.title: "Music Wire Toilet Auger"
reviews.text: Be sure to read the instructions first.  It worked great and opened the grain in 3 minutes when I followed the instructions.
reviews.author: Bob

reviews.title: "Works Great!"
reviews.text: This worked so quickly to get a giant clog cleared from my toilet!  Love how easy to use it was.
reviews.author: Lindsay

reviews.text: Easy way to snake a toilet, and still keep your hands clean.
reviews.author: Sean

reviews.title: "worked great"
reviews.text: toddler threw a toothbrush down the toilet and it clogged it so we used this to dislodge it in about 2secs.  worked fantastic.
reviews.author: Myles

reviews.text: I bought this today and it worked perfectly!  It got the job done quick! would definitely recommend it to anyone!
reviews.author: none

reviews.title: "Wire Toilet Auger"
reviews.text: This handy little item did the trick to clear a nasty clog. The down side is that you need to remove fecal matter from the tip which can be difficult and time consuming. But at least the toilet can be flushed!
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Perfect Works Easily"
reviews.text: If you have a clogged toilet just pick up  a Liquid-Plumr 3/8-in x 3-ft Music Wire Toilet Auger for about $11  at Lowes ! take it home, follow simple directions and in seconds your toilet will be unclogged !   For a week I bought and tried several drain openers and plunged and plunged and plunged have an accordion style plunger that has always unclogged our toilet But this time the clog was tight as a TIC and would not budge I though oh no ! I read the reviews I ordered online with free in store pick up and took within seconds my first try the clog was gone Wew ! My toilet is now flushing great !!!! This is a GREAT device and everyone who has a toilet needs one Some said the end of the auger was messy and difficult to clean b/c of debris (poo) I gently swished it around in the toilet bowl to loosen the poo then kinda propped the handle against the the shower wall spraying the entire device with disinfectant cleaner let it dry then had hubby spray with WD 40 so it doesn't rust ( thank you for this tip) will hang in storage building for future use
reviews.author: DebbyNc

reviews.title: "Worked well  twice and then broke"
reviews.text: It's not strong enough to be used on an ongoing basis ( kid that had a fascination with flushing kitchen roll)  worked great x 2 and on the third attempt stuck, after a lot of wiggling and attempting to finesse the head out, I tried pulling and the coil immediately kinked rendering it useless. For a one-off job though it's almost cheap enough to throw away. I rated it a 2 as I expected to be keeping it a little longer than 3 weeks.
reviews.author: haltse

reviews.title: "Great Tool!"
reviews.text: I had a clog in my toilet and last night I kept trying over and over using the plunger.  It just wouldn't work.  I went to Lowe's and bought this Toilet Auger this morning.  This was my first time using such a tool.  On my first try, I kept cranking the handle and the wire would not go down very far.  I reread the instructions and it said to push down while cranking the handle.  The wire went down fast after doing it correctly and then it caught on something.  I had trouble pulling it out, but I was persistent.  A bunch of toilet paper and other things too gross to mention was caught in the "cage".  I was so happy and now my toilet flushes beautifully.  I am a 68 year old female and if I can do it, anyone can.  The only negative thing was I didn't pay attention and I scratched my toilet bowl.  Oh well, I can live with that.
reviews.author: KittyKat

reviews.title: "Well worth it!"
reviews.text: My toilet was flushing, but with so little force that the paper wouldn't go down. I plunged multiple times without any luck. Having previously scratched a toilet with a snake, I was almost resigned to calling a plumber (who would charge me a fortune and leave a trail of dirty boot prints all over my house) when I stumbled on this toilet auger. I was doubtful it would fix my issue, but given the reviews I figured I would give it a try. It took just one try to clear whatever was stuck in there. The only problem I had was finding the auger at my local Lowes. The website said there were a bunch available, but there were none in the plumbing aisle. Luckily a very helpful associate found a box full of them on the top shelf. He said it was probably a new item that hadn't been put on the shelves yet. Thank you Lowes and Liquid Plumr!
reviews.author: DaisyDoodle

reviews.title: "It works!"
reviews.text: We had a toilet that was stopped up for 2 days. Plunged and plunged and plunged until our arms are sore. Tried the dishwashing  liquid and hot water-just ended up with tons of bubbles. Tried an ancient snake we had but no luck. Decided to try this as a last ditch effort before calling a plumber. Got it based on the reviews and on the second attempt we had success. Toilet is running great.
reviews.author: Jody

reviews.title: "I am no longer UNSURE! I am Satisfied!"
reviews.text: I have had a toilet back up for 2 days. I have tried plunging it several times a day, nothing happened. I spoke to a maintenance tech at my job, he suggested to get a snake. I asked around, none of my friends had a snake for me to borrow. I looked on Lowe's website and found several. As luck would have it, pricing for the snakes were reasonable. I looked and filtered until I came across the Liquid Plum'r Snake. The Liquid Plum'r Snake had a tutorial video, I hit the jackpot! After watching the video, I order it. I picked it up, headed home. I literally took me 10 minutes to unclog my toilet. I am very well pleased. Yes, I would recommend this product to anyone that is facing a clogged toilet issues! Proof is in the results!
reviews.author: YesILikeIt

reviews.title: "Works great"
reviews.text: My daughter put a corndog stick in the toilet and stopped it up and I was able to get it out using this tool I will keep this handy for the next time
reviews.author: Dano2435

reviews.title: "Worth every penny!!!"
reviews.text: Clogged toilet for 4 days.  Much plunging, hot water, soap.  Bought this bad boy and with 2 rounds clog was gone.  Glad to have this in my garage for future use, though I hope to net need it again.  Yeah, right!!  LOL
reviews.author: Elizabeth

reviews.title: "It works!"
reviews.text: Ive never reviewed anything before, but I want to share the joy I now have because I took a chance and bought this snake for less than $11. I was very skeptical that anything other than calling a plummer could work. I tried plunging & then the dish soap thing. Nope.  I really thought that I was going to get nowhere with this too. It took me a couple of tries and I thought for sure that 3ft  wasnt long enough, but I met resistance at about 2 feet 10 inches and cranked the snake and pushed with force and it sent the motherload down the slough.  It works if your clog is in the toilet.I give it 5 stars because it works!! I have never used a toilet snake. I am a 50 year old mom with a bad hand. Have patience & don't give up! I regret not buying it sooner.
reviews.author: classicmom

reviews.title: "Liquid Plumber"
reviews.text: Good working tool....better than a comparable product Home Depot had!
reviews.author: HJ

reviews.title: "Quick fix - worked perfect!"
reviews.text: As advertised - cleared a slug of bearded dragon lizard fluid that was flushed and stuck in the toilet trap.
reviews.author: Quickfix

reviews.title: "Music has no place in the title"
reviews.text: But it is music to the ear when this tool unclogs the toilet from toilet bowl to exit at bottom.It saved a bundle in a remedial to problem.   Thanks for a great tool at a reasonable price.
reviews.author: Ray

reviews.title: "Solid Product!"
reviews.text: Had a 3 day clog caused by an ignorant guest. Tried multiple ‘hacks' from youtube to no avail. Stumbled upon this product by chance n gave it a try. Clearing the clog was NOT a breeze, but definitely works with some elbow grease. Once you get the hang of it, it serves its purpose. Helps with clogs within 3 ft from bottom of toilet. Definitley recommended over any plunger!
reviews.author: DIYerNovice

reviews.title: "Toilet Snake"
reviews.text: Worked perfect. This was my first time using a snake to clear a clog in my toilet. Normally the plunger does the job, but this was a slow draining situation. Easy instructions and I recovered a small Captain America shield which was causing the slow draining toilet. Kids......
reviews.author: Pat

reviews.title: "Cleared toilet clog in a two minutes!"
reviews.text: On a visit to my mom's, her toilet clogged up. It was flushing, but very slowly, not with enough force to get poop down the drain.  I tried plunging and hot water with dish soap.  I used a regular drain snake and it wouldn't go around the toilet drain bends.  I got out an old heavy duty closet auger I bought at a yard sale that I had never used before. It got all coiled up and bent in a few places. I think maybe it was too stiff because of the larger diameter wire or i wasn't using it properly.  I had work scheduled so I left for a few days while mom pooped in a bucket.  On my way back I picked up this light duty closet auger at Lowes.  I brought it in thinking it wouldn't work and that I'd be removing the toilet to clear the clog. I snaked it in twice and on the second removal I saw some remanants of toilet paper in the water. I flushed and it worked normally. I ran the auger through a few more times to be sure it was clear. I think the key for me was being slow and gentle when I got to the clog. Im guessing that if I had kept pushing and cranking when I felt the spiral tension growing that this one might have bent like the other one.  Some patience and backing off then gojng in again worked well.
reviews.author: Sterling-Hearth

reviews.title: "The only kind of snake I like"
reviews.text: We have a toddler that flushed some wipes down the toilet (creative little buggers...). Was unable to fix the inconvenience with draino or a plunger. Being the adult homeowner I am, purchased this auger to remedy my blockage. The hubs was unable to unplug the the backup after trying for what he said was hours... Only took me five minutes to free our pipes of baby wipe bondage. To which the hubs explained that he had "loosened" it for me.In any case, the auger worked and the wipes are now on a shelf high above where toddlers can climb.
reviews.author: Heather

reviews.title: "A True Miracle Product"
reviews.text: I had a really bad clog and was one step away from calling a plumber,when a friend suggested that I buy myself a plumbers snake before,calling an expensive plumber. After reading the reviews and doing much research I decided that this product was exactly what I needed. Long story short. Following the instructions to a tee and within minutes, my toilet was flowing free and clear without any problems or scratches to the inside of the bowl. Do yourself a favor and make sure you have one or two of these handy. You won't regret it.
reviews.author: LCP39

reviews.title: "Good quality Auger"
reviews.text: This auger is just as good as any in this price range.  The quality is good.  The only negative, for certain situations, is the length.  A 6-feet wire would be ideal but augers with this length are usually more expensive.
reviews.author: DrCPhD

reviews.title: "excellent value for homeowner"
reviews.text: this is a light weight version of the professional version of this product. I was a bit skeptical of the build quality as I own a professional version that I have used for years. however when the plunger would not clear the clog created by my family while a houseguest, I went and picked this up. it worked perfectly. I cleared the clog in about 45 seconds. I don't know how much use this tool will get after I leave town but it should hold up for typical homeowners usage. definitely not of a grade for daily use.
reviews.author: mrfixit

reviews.title: "Does Exactly What It Says"
reviews.text: This product was easy to use and extremely effective. Before I bought this, I had an appointment for a plumber to come take care of the situation. Since it was a weekend, they couldn't come until hours after I called, so I decided to try this to (hopefully) save some money. This product was way cheaper than a plumber and extremely easy to use. The directions are easy and the price is great. Highly recommend
reviews.author: EAEA

reviews.title: "It's working on toilet"
reviews.text: My bathroom toilet was clogged and flushed very slow. I tried with hot, hot water with hand soap. But it seems not working. I bought this auger. Tried to spin the wire and finally got wire gone through. The problem was resolved.
reviews.author: jlu

reviews.title: "Toilet auger"
reviews.text: It worked fine for the length that it could reach. I believe I have a blockage further down the line though.
reviews.author: Sheteachart

reviews.title: "This works!!"
reviews.text: I had a tough time with toilet clog and I was reluctant in using chemicals which says it will unclog in minutes or worst case overnight. But I had read about concerns of such chemicals causing damage to wax on toilet pipe fittings. So I preferred using a toilet snake and the Liquid-Plumr worked well after 5-6 tries! Great product and good to have!
reviews.author: sjoy0703

reviews.text: For an inexpensive tool it worked pretty well.  I had never used one before.  Always been able to clear the toilet clog with a plunger.  This was necessary instead and it did the trick nicely.
reviews.author: Michael

reviews.title: "Not Long Enough And Hard To Get Into Outlet"
reviews.text: Concept is great but not long enough to get at problem.  Also, virtually impossible to “snake” into toile outlet without curling back on itself!  Once I got into outlet opening after an hour or so, I could hear it flopping around inside the toilet rather than going down the down pipe.  Never got it to work and finally rigged my own snake inside an old garden hose which got down to the problem.  Waited about 10 bucks on this Liquid- Plumr snake.  Not up to the quality products sold by Liquid-Plumr usually are.
reviews.author: Jim1743

reviews.title: "Works Like A Charm!!"
reviews.text: I had a terrible clog in the guest bathroom toilet that will be used for my Super Bowl party on Sunday (today is Friday). I wanted to try everything I could before I called a plumber and paid weekend rates for the repair. After any number of youtube remedies, I stumbled across this and picked it up. It took less time to clear the clog than it did to walk back to my car after buying it. Best $11 or so I've spent in a long time. I do appreciate the advice from another post to dry it so it doesn't rust.
reviews.author: Tapper65

reviews.title: "Quick Fix"
reviews.text: This little gizzmo did the trick.  Following the recommendations and online video, went out to my nearest Lowe's and bought one. When I came home and inserted this baby into the commode, applying good, steady pressure to get the boring head all the way extended, it broke up whatever was clogging the pipe.  In other words, it took a little more than gently pushing, but the toilet is flushing strong now. Slick tool for the money.
reviews.author: Mark

reviews.title: "Works great! Purchase it you'll be glad you did!"
reviews.text: After trying everything to unclog our toilet (daughter flushed a bunch of wipes) ...dish soap, buckets of hot water, a snake, nothing worked.  Went and bought this as a last resort!  Did it 3 times and toilet unclogged!  Awesome product!
reviews.author: Naybob

reviews.title: "Slick !"
reviews.text: Used for a severely clogged toilet, I was a little skeptical of the price but it turned out to be the best $10 I ever spent ! Under 5 mins and done. Bye Bye expensive plumbers. Very easy to use as well. A child could use it.
reviews.author: Jonesy

reviews.title: "Replace that plunger and mess with the answer !!!"
reviews.text: Know have spent WAY too much on better and better plunger solutions to my propensity to clog up a toilet. This economical solution replaces that plunger and mess with the proper solution. This was a thrifty solution as well!
reviews.author: Ranger

reviews.title: "Easy to use and did the job"
reviews.text: This auger was very easy to use and did the job.  Well worth the money and saved me from having to call a plumber and pay a whole lot more.
reviews.author: lmtayl05

reviews.title: "Not quite pro"
reviews.text: I was a plumber for approximately 10 years. For some reason I sold my very expensive toilet snake. This one, although not that pro grade, does an adequate job for the average homeowner to clean out a toilet problem.
reviews.author: Jarhead

reviews.title: "Sure and least expensive way to unclog toilet"
reviews.text: I got tired of putting dish soap, hot water and use the regular plunger. Toilet was still clogged until I went to Lowes and bought this auger. You just need to push it all the way. Great product.
reviews.author: rafatx

reviews.title: "Plumber's aid without the plumber"
reviews.text: I tried to clear a toilet clog with plunger, then the Dawn and boiling water treatment.  Both turned out to be temporary measures.  The toilet snake saved the day and eliminated the problem.
reviews.author: Yolie

reviews.title: "You'll have better luck flushing the money"
reviews.text: This "tool" is hot garbage except for its intended purpose which appears to be parting a fool with their money and for that it works perfectly.  Toilet work - not so much.
reviews.author: DisgruntledPlumber

reviews.title: "Clogged Toilet"
reviews.text: Worked great. Unclogged the toilet. Saved me the cost of hiring a plumber.
reviews.author: Michael

reviews.title: "Best money I ever spent"
reviews.text: I worked for an entire day to clear a clog using the "hot water and Dawn" method as well as the "baking soda and vinegar" method.  My third attempt was to purchase this before call a plumber, after running this down the drain twice the clog suddenly let loose and my problems were over.  BTW I'm a 60+ single woman who doesn't know much about tools, but this was so easy to use it didn't matter!
reviews.author: Chris

reviews.title: "Awesome"
reviews.text: My 2 year old put a plastic bottle in the toilet. After plunging to no avail, I bought this and bam, 1 minute later, no clogs...the bottle can out
reviews.author: Kay

reviews.title: "Unclogging a messy toilet"
reviews.text: I bought this product for about $10 to avoid calling a plumber!  Love this tool! YouTube showed me how to use it and it was a breeze!
reviews.author: Jeanne

reviews.title: "No Plummer Needed"
reviews.text: This inexpensive auger did the job in 5 minutes saving us an $85 service call. A must have in every home.
reviews.author: DougMac

reviews.title: "Great"
reviews.text: This did the job of unclogging the toilet. Saved me calling a plumber.
reviews.author: Stephen

reviews.title: "It's ok"
reviews.text: It wasn't as easy to use as I thought it was going to be
reviews.author: Nell

reviews.title: "As advertised"
reviews.text: It's a toilet snake.  Nothing fancy, it just works fine.
reviews.author: sloopy

reviews.title: "auger"
reviews.text: Works just great. Worth the money to have on hand.
reviews.author: Joseph

reviews.title: "Auger Review"
reviews.text: Worked like a charm.  Wife had accidentally dropped a cheap bracelet in toilet while it was flushing.  After that, the toilet kept clogging up.  I had my doubts that this would work...my goal was just to push this bracelet through.  Miraculously, it actually snagged the bracelet when I was fishing it back up.  No more clog!
reviews.author: Gla5543

reviews.title: "Dirty Job"
reviews.text: Worked Great!  Be persistent! It took me 3 times to clear the stoppage, and when it seemed to be starting to drain, I plunged it again and that did it! Plunging had not gotten it before. You can do it! YouTube it if you need help. (BTW-it shows here that there are none in the store, but there were at least 3 on the shelf?
reviews.author: DirtyJobs

reviews.title: "Good product"
reviews.text: Needed to unplug a Kohler toilet with an almost triangular shaped throat.  Regular plunger did not have a large enough diameter end to completely cover the throat so it did not work.  This toilet auger worked.  The L shape in the plastic guide tube made it easy to direct the auger in the toilet and kept it in place.
reviews.author: RCN

reviews.title: "It Worked Like a Charm"
reviews.text: After multiple plumber visits in the past few years to clear dense large poop blockages, we purchased this auger and it works perfectly.  The only downside is it is difficult to impossible to clean fecal matter off of the tip of the tool.  That being said, we will try to clean it once more and then pitch it and buy a replacement.  Even with one time use, the service call for the plumber is ten times the cost of a new one of these augers.
reviews.author: NYNY

reviews.title: "kink kink and more kink"
reviews.text: This product wasn't worth the gas to pick it up and have to return it. All these reviews are a joke. Unless you are trying to clear a blockage within the first 4 inches of the toilet, don't even bother with this product.
reviews.author: EB

reviews.title: "Liquid-Plumr 3/8-in x 3-ft Music Wire Toilet Auger"
reviews.text: After trying all other remedies to resolve slow flushing toilet and watching you tube videos I was about to call for back up (plumber).  Then I came across this item and I said to myself “heck, it's only 10 dollars I'm trying it”.  WOW!!! It did the job and it was easy to use.
reviews.author: Ron

reviews.title: "A MUST HAVE for any bathroom!!!!"
reviews.text: As my dad used to say, “Who'da Thunk?”...that something at this price would work so wonderfully? After spending no less than a half hour plunging the toilet, I researched for solutions, then purchased this from Lowe's. I was SHOCKED at how quickly the clog cleared.  I inserted this auger and, LITERALLY, within 30 seconds, the clog released.  I then flushed it one more time to be sure it cleared completely and it had.
reviews.author: xomexome

reviews.title: "Worthless"
reviews.text: The wire is neither stiff enough or long enough to do the job. Should have trusted my first instinct and never purchased the item. I gave it one star only because no stars are available.
reviews.author: Bob

reviews.title: "CLeans it out!"
reviews.text: I purchased the toilet auger as the toilet I have has an elongated drainage which keeps a standard plunger from making contact with all sides, thus a standard plunger does not work well at all in these toilets. You must have a constant rotation of the auger to get it through the toilet trap. Works well and solved my problem.
reviews.author: byakstis

reviews.title: "Good product"
reviews.text: Easy to use.  Cleaning is a little hard after clearing up a hard clog.
reviews.author: TMelle

reviews.title: "DON"T waste your money!!"
reviews.text: I read 1 review that said it kinks up. I should have taken that review as right. I thing kinks up & a had to take it back.
reviews.author: Disapointed

reviews.title: "product worked very well."
reviews.text: Product unplugged my toilet which has been an ongoing headache.
reviews.author: Debbie

reviews.title: "Great tool but not for the job i needed done."
reviews.text: The task i needed done was difficult. unfortunately i could not use this tool to get the job done. it was a plastic ball my son threw into the toilet bowl and it got stuck. i an certain it would have been an easy fix of it was solid waste. i has to call a plumber, two of them came and it took them quite some time.
reviews.author: Stephen

reviews.title: "Perfect"
reviews.text: I used as instructed.. And It worked in less than 3 minutes. The culprit causing the clog.. Disinfectant wipes & a toothbrush! I highly recommend for the effectiveness and price.. not to mention the cost of not having to call a plumber.
reviews.author: MsFixedIt

reviews.title: "Did the Job"
reviews.text: After stopping up my toilet with paper towels from dog poop, I tried the toilet auger and it worked like a charm.Imagine paying an $85 plummer's visit for a one minute job.  All home owners should have a similar toollike this.
reviews.author: Heronva

reviews.title: "Toilet auger"
reviews.text: This was a great tool it did the job. Good price in a pinch. Would give it a 5 stars but the only thing I wish was it to be a few feet longer. On the stool that I have I had to take it out and then run the auger down the pipe.
reviews.author: Chuck76

reviews.title: "3ft Music Wire Toilet Auger"
reviews.text: I got the music wire toilet auger at lowe's of Mount Airy unstopped my toilet in 3 minutes, I had tried to use plunger for almost an hour without success. Highly recommend music wire toilet auger for tough clogs. *****
reviews.author: jerry

reviews.title: "Excellent toilet auger"
reviews.text: July-17-2018. It does what it claims to do. Glad I read these reviews before going to Lowes to purchase one. Bought it, went home, used it and 2-minutes later the toilet was unclogged. Great value for only $10!
reviews.author: Craig-in-GrandRapids

reviews.title: "1st Try"
reviews.text: Worked the first time! Don't know what it was that caused the stoppage and really don't care either. Won't use a rubber plunger EVER again.
reviews.author: Alister

reviews.title: "1st Try"
reviews.text: Worked the first time! Don't know what it was that caused the stoppage and really don't care either. Won't use a rubber plunger EVER again.
reviews.author: Alister

reviews.title: "Gets job done where plunger fails"
reviews.text: The bent tube allows the snake to be angled correctly to snake out the waste path without getting hands wet/dirty. Quickly cleared the trap blockage that repeated attempts with the plunger failed to loosen!
reviews.author: Glen

reviews.title: "It does the job"
reviews.text: Bought this to clear my toilet that was slow flushing. Didn't want to get anything bigger as that would mean an actual plumber or a longer snake. Happy happy my poopy is flowing freely.
reviews.author: Wezelbleeder

reviews.title: "Excellent product"
reviews.text: I needed to get an item lodged in my toilet out & didn't want to call a plumber & pay a fortune.I got this & the toilet was running free and clear within a minute of using this snake.
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "Absolutely the best tool"
reviews.text: I was very worried that this tool for unplugging toilet and drains was just another waste of my money and time, but to my surprise it turned out to be quite the opposite. It took roughly 30 seconds from the time I removed it from its packaging to unplugging my toilet. I then immediately threw the worthless $14.00 plunger into the trash. Absolutely the best tool investment ever.
reviews.author: Ty

reviews.title: "Great little toilet snake"
reviews.text: Bought it for my mommy clogged toilet and it was super easy to use. Unclogged the toilet super fast and worth the small price to pay versus the cost of a plumber. Would recommend!
reviews.author: Sarah

reviews.title: "life saver"
reviews.text: My 3yr put a ball down the toliet that was just barley able tp fit so it got stuck and it had bumps so it was impossible to plung or grab this got it right out best $10 ever spent
reviews.author: butterfly

reviews.title: "Not Long Enough"
reviews.text: For another $11 you can buy a hand held spiral wrap model which provides a 20 foot snake. I bought this model only to have to go back to Lowes for a device with longer reach.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "Works Great!"
reviews.text: Tried everything to fix clogged toilet including using plungers for 20 minutes...this thing unclogged it after getting it all the way in and rotating the handle for a while
reviews.author: Lance

reviews.title: "Perfect for home toilets"
reviews.text: I needed a tool to unclog a toilet after trying unsuccessfully to correct the problem with a plungsr. This tool was inexpensive yet sturdy. It did the job . It's a keeper!
reviews.author: Ande

reviews.title: "Snake broke through clog"
reviews.text: This item successfully broke through an accidentally flushed ink pen and the toilet paper dam that followed. Saved us hundreds $$ by not having to call plumber.
reviews.author: MJ

reviews.title: "Did the job."
reviews.text: My toilet was flushing really slowly, actually barely.  This auger finally got it to flush,though it's still slow.  Probably gonna need the plumber eventually.
reviews.author: swiftdreams

reviews.title: "Great Option for Mean Clog!"
reviews.text: After trying multiple types of plungers, went to the snake.  Cheaper types had not stiffness to cable and were inadequate. The firmness of this snake, even with limited length did the trick.  Easy insertion and easy handling.  Length turned out to be just enough... hmm.  A fee pull outs & reinsertions were done to final drill through clog, but tool was easy to clean.
reviews.author: Austing

reviews.title: "Worked as expected."
reviews.text: This drain snake did exactly what is it designed to do. No fancy bells or whistles. It was about as easy to use as I would expect for what I paid for it.
reviews.author: Sean

reviews.title: "It works"
reviews.text: When liquid uncloggers failed, and the plumber's helper couldn't get the job done, this did.  It was easy to use and effective. What more do you want?
reviews.author: William

reviews.title: "wire toilet auger"
reviews.text: I figured the obstruction had to be just beyond the bend under the bowl.After a few tries I figured how much force to use.The blockage was cleared.
reviews.author: Denny

reviews.title: "Good Bathroom Tool"
reviews.text: Worked just fine to pull a clog that my kid flushed down the toilet. I'm sure it will have several future applications. Very easy to use.
reviews.author: Dbb100

reviews.title: "Forget the Plunger"
reviews.text: Excellent for those clogs where the plunger just isn't enough. Easy to use, will clear the lines for smoother flushing
reviews.author: Hmene

reviews.title: "Blocked toilets"
reviews.text: Excellent for blockages within length of auger. Does not work if blockage is farther down the pipe.
reviews.author: Pete

reviews.title: "Amazing"
reviews.text: This auger fixed a toilet clog that I thought for sure was the end of my toilet. I'm so glad I bought it!
reviews.author: Kat

reviews.title: "Does the job"
reviews.text: Saved me a few times from having to totally disassemble one of our toilets from kids flushing toys
reviews.author: McIntee

reviews.title: "Great too."
reviews.text: Worked great on a plugged up toilet.  Was quick, easy instructions and very clean....did the job.
reviews.author: bemarshall2

reviews.title: "Solved our problem!"
reviews.text: Tried our old plunger...no workie. Bought this and bam, problem solved! Cheaper than a plumber!
reviews.author: J

reviews.title: "It works"
reviews.text: The toilet was mega clogged... now it's not.  That's a 5 star rating if I've ever heard one.
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.title: "Returned item"
reviews.text: The tool would not navigate around bends in pipe. I feel the design powered by a drill works better.
reviews.author: Kurt

reviews.text: The toilet auger worked great, I was able to get my toilet unplugged and working again.
reviews.author: DJ

reviews.title: "Excellent Product"
reviews.text: I tried all the dish soap and hot water to unclog my toilet.  It didn't work on this clog.  I bought the toilet auger and it is excellent.  The clog was out in a matter of minutes and the auger was well worth what I paid. I didn't have to pay a plumber which was fantastic!!!!  I'm a 63 year old woman and I was delighted it was so easy!!!
reviews.author: Rosebud

reviews.title: "What a drain."
reviews.text: This thing works great for toilet clogs, so much better than plungers.
reviews.author: Smitty

reviews.title: "Great tool"
reviews.text: Used this to unclog the toilet and in less than a minute I was done!
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Must have in the house!"
reviews.text: It works well and everyone should own one in case of an emergency.
reviews.author: Ali

reviews.title: "Auger"
reviews.text: The spring should be a little longer but it does work.
reviews.author: Jimmy

reviews.title: "Liquid-Plumr 3/8-in x 3-ft Music Wire Toilet Auger"
reviews.text: It worked clearing the clog after several attempts and a week past, it finally went down. It damaged the white porcelain in our toilet with scratches.
reviews.author: KY0B

reviews.title: "Well designed"
reviews.text: The rotating screw/spring piece actually rotates inside of the curved tube so that the visible china part of the toilet does not get damaged/scorged.
reviews.author: shaun

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Al

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: jeff

reviews.title: "its a Toilet Snake Yaaaaaa...."
reviews.text: well my kids think its fun to fill the toilet with a roll of toilet paper. isn't it great you can buy this product to get it out.
reviews.author: Bob

reviews.title: "Great for enlongated toilet clogs"
reviews.text: I have yet to find a good plunger that works for enlongated toilets. I've tried 3 different plungers and they were not big enought to create a seal to clear the clog. I bought this snake today and cleared 2 clogged toilet in less than a minute each. I would definately recommend this product.
reviews.author: Jae

reviews.title: "Best toilet auger"
reviews.text: This is the second Liquid- plumr  auger I have purchased- I used the first one to death. It works remarkably well to clear clogs without the mess a plunger makes. It is easy to use and does not scratch the porcelain of the bowl. Plus the price is very reasonable.
reviews.author: Elvira

reviews.title: "Good Economical Product for Clogged Toilet"
reviews.text: With a clogged toilet I had tried the first two recommended solutions, putting dishwasher detergent and plunging without success. Purchased the toilet auger and it was able to clear the clog in two attempts. The price was economical and it was able to handle a basic toilet clog.
reviews.author: JAKentucky

reviews.title: "worked great"
reviews.text: I did everything like a champ thanks to this toilet auger, the plunger was not wotking
reviews.author: Fausfez

reviews.title: "Easy to use"
reviews.text: This auger helped clear a blockage.  It is easy to use and does not scratch the bowl.
reviews.author: Denny

reviews.text: Not bad. Takes a few times to figure out how to use correctly.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.text: Got the job done. Much easier to use than a long snake.
reviews.author: Scott

reviews.title: "Didnt quite do the job."
reviews.text: This product wasn't long enough to get the job done.
reviews.author: Larry

reviews.text: I thought it was worth trying since it wasn't expensive and most reviews were good. Unfortunately it didn't work and I had to call the plumber anyway.Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Susan

reviews.title: "Flush Fixer"
reviews.text: Just a few minutes with the Liquid Plumr toilet auger takes care of your flushing problems. Plungers don't always do the job. This auger does the job in less time with less mess. Built to last and easy to use.
reviews.author: Marvin

reviews.title: "Toilet auger"
reviews.text: Works good, fixes the problem. Kind of gross to clean but I just placed into a garbage bag and took outside to hose off and sprayed with Lysol and hung in garage to dry.  Much better than plunger.
reviews.author: AKCE

reviews.title: "Everyone Needs one"
reviews.text: This is a great tool. When the toilet is stopped up you call for the Toilet Auger. It does the job and sits and waits for the next chance to star again. This is a must have for everyone.
reviews.author: Stuman74

reviews.title: "It works"
reviews.text: I tried to push the snake through the trapway with the handle but it wouldn't go. I wound up putting my hands in the bowl and forcing the snake through the trapway. It removed the clog.
reviews.author: David

reviews.title: "Works great"
reviews.text: This product works great. It is made of metal on the chain but the casing is plastic. It worked great at unplugging quickly and easily. Hands down better than paying a plumber.
reviews.author: Danny

reviews.title: "Perfect! Perfect price and worked in seconds!"
reviews.text: Perfect! Perfect price and worked in seconds! Don't call a plumber, forget the plunger and all the internet tricks. Stick and spin a couple of times and you're done....ahhhhhh!
reviews.author: Ray

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Works good"
reviews.text: Was a little stiffer than expected and did take some work. Scratched up the toilet but it saved me 380$ of plumbing cost by not having to call a plumber.
reviews.author: Zach

reviews.title: "Liquid-Plumr 3/8-in x 3-ft Music Wire Toilet Auger"
reviews.text: guys this work great u need to get one if u are plug up it work great for me  i thought i was going to have change out the  Labeled but i use this and got throw it
reviews.author: David

reviews.title: "All You Really Need"
reviews.text: The exact tool needed to dislodge toilet clogs where they most often occur, within the first three feet of the trap. Simple, works great, highly effective.
reviews.author: midcenturyguy

reviews.title: "It is a great product"
reviews.text: We had a blocked toilet and tried everything to open it up. The music wire toilet auger was the only thing that worked. We would definately recommend it.
reviews.author: Dannem

reviews.title: "Works Great!"
reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It was reasonably priced, easy to use and the quality is acceptable. Saved me an $80 plumbing bill!
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "A Must Have"
reviews.text: When the plunger doesn't work, this is the tool you will need! Be sure to follow the directions so you do not scrape your toilet.
reviews.author: Chuck

reviews.title: "Durability"
reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten one with a more durable material.  It is really a waste of money because it will need to be replaced.
reviews.author: Teri

reviews.title: "Excellent product"
reviews.text: Fantastic product for dealing with toilet issues. Could not use chemicals but this did a tremendous job rectifying the problem.
reviews.author: Andy

reviews.title: "Works Great"
reviews.text: I had never used anything like this, but the instructions were very easy to follow. It saved me having to have a plumber visit!
reviews.author: Laura

reviews.title: "Weak snake"
reviews.text: It did not take long for the snake to deform and become useless. Your money is better spent renting a professional auger,
reviews.author: Miguel

reviews.text: For the price it performed as expected. Difficult to spin cable in the trap and the cable would turn on its self.
reviews.author: Strawberry

reviews.title: "It feels sturdy !"

reviews.title: "I've always called this a toilet snake."

reviews.title: "Works Well"
reviews.text: What can you say about a toilet auger, it does what it's supposed to.  Well made of quality materials.
reviews.author: DIYGUYM

reviews.title: "Works great"

reviews.text: hand a badly clogged toilet, it took more than one attempt, but my toilet is back in working order.

reviews.title: "Works"

questions.question: "Could you use this for a shower clog?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: This product is designed for use in sinks and drains, so it will be fine to use in the shower. Please make sure you are following these steps: 1. Pull tape from case and insert boring head into drain opening until clog is reached. 2. Move boring head back and forth until clog is loosened. 3. Use handle to rewind tape. 4. Rinse drain with water. 5. Repeat if necessary. 6. Clean and dry tool before storing.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, this can be used for your shower clog.

questions.question: "Can i use thjs washing machine drain clog ?"
questions.author: amit

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: Although this product may work for that application, we would recommend the Liquid Plumr Hand Auger for that job. You can find this item at Lowe's as well in the plumbing repair aisle. This is Lowe's Item Number 866146. As always, if you have any further questions, or would like to discuss with our customer support team, call 1-800-320-8045 from 9am to 5pm EST.

questions.question: "Does it actually play music when you turn the handle"
questions.author: guy

answers.author: Sterling-Hearth
answers.text: Mine did. Would have returned it if it didn't.

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: The term music wire is an industry term used to describe the type of wire used in a particular application. In this application music wire refers to a fairly high grade, high carbon steel wire.

questions.question: "what's the difference between a snake and an auger?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: Thank you for your question. The auger in this question is intended for toilet clogs. The boring head is a little larger than a sink snake. The Sink Snake (Lowe's Item 866146) is thinner and intended for sink and tub drain clogs. If you would like to discuss further, please call us anytime M-F 9am to 5pm EST at 1-800-320-8045 to discuss further.

questions.question: "Does this product contain any materials known to cause cancer or reprodu"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: Thank you for your question and concern. There are no products that require Prop 65 warning labels in this product. Please feel free to call and discuss with our customer care center anytime M-F 9am to 5pm EST at 1-800-320-8045.

questions.question: "Does this product contain any materials known to cause cancer or reprodu"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: Thank you for your question and concern. There are no products that require Prop 65 warning labels in this product. Please feel free to call and discuss with our customer care center anytime M-F 9am to 5pm EST at 1-800-320-8045.

questions.question: "Does this product contain materials known to cause cancer or reproductive harm? As provided for in proposition 65 in the state of California?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: Thank you for your question and concern. There are no products that require Prop 65 warning labels in this product. Please feel free to call and discuss with our customer care center anytime M-F 9am to 5pm EST at 1-800-320-8045.

questions.question: "Will this work on sinks and tubs?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: This product was designed for use in toilets only. We have another option in a drain auger. It is Lowe's Item 866146. It is designed to be used in drains from 0.75 inches to 2 inches in diameter and will work great in a sink and tub. It can be found in the drain cleaning tools aisle in store as well as online. Thank you for you question. Should you have more questions, please feel free to call our customer service at 1-800-320-8045 M-F from 9am mto 5pm EST.

questions.question: "I have a toothbrush stuck in the toilet will the item work"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: This product was not designed to retrieve items from the toilet. It does not have a grasping mechanism on the end. It was designed to clear blockages. We appreciate the interest in this product and for asking the question, but you may want to consider a different tool for the toothbrush removal.

questions.question: "Can this be used on outside basement drain"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Allen-WGB
answers.text: This product was designed specifically for use in toilets. While we appreciate the interest in our products, we would not want you to purchase and be disappointed. We would recommend looking for a more professional grade instrument for an outdoor job involving larger, outdoor drainage pipes.
